content: the cheeseburger hat note please check your gauge and adjust hook size if necessary i tend to crochet tighter than average so what fits children for me and my gauge might fit adults for yours materials  worsted weight yarn in the following colors - to make a toddler size you will need to leave out row #7 which will give you 60 sts instead of 66 sts make 2 less tan row in the upper section than called for and 1 less tan row in the last section than called for - to make an adult size simply go up one hook size notes  join each round with a slip_stitch in the first stitch pattern begin with tan yarn and a magic loop if you are uncomfortable with the magic loop you can chain 2 and start with round 1 into the 1st chain round 1 9 half_double_crochet in magic loop 10 sts round 2 chain 2 2 half_double_crochet in each st 20 round 3 chain 2 *2 half_double_crochet in 1st st 1 half_double_crochet in next st* 30 round 4 chain 2 *2 half_double_crochet in 1st st 1 half_double_crochet in next 2 sts* 40 round 5 chain 2 *2 half_double_crochet in 1st st 1 half_double_crochet in next 3 sts* 50 round 6 chain 2 *2 half_double_crochet in 1st st 1 half_double_crochet in next 4 sts* 60 1 cheeseburger hat | http //devinlikestoknit wordpress com | round 7 chain 2 *2 half_double_crochet in 1st st 1 half_double_crochet in next 9 sts* 66 round 8-10 half_double_crochet in each st switch to green yarn round 11 double_crochet in each st round 12 work this round in front loops only *skip 2 single_crochet skip 2 6 double_crochet in st* round 13 double_crochet in each back loop of round 11 you will have a ruffle of lettuce sticking out don t worry about this until later switch to red yarn round 14 double_crochet in each st switch to yellow yarn rounds 15-16 single_crochet in each st switch to brown yarn round 17 *single_crochet double_crochet* round 18 *double_crochet single_crochet* round 19 *single_crochet double_crochet* switch back to tan yarn rounds 20-22 half_double_crochet in each st
